settings.editor:
Relax in the "Dreamy Selenia" Suite, do not miss anything, all that you need for happiness is here. Complete calm. Really too beautiful to leave it.
If only there were not your curiosity about our SPA & Recreational services, or our restaurant, clubs and piano bar ...
Some of meals menu available for your suite meal order
Two Eggs, Crispy Potato, Tomato Jam, House Made Sausage or Bacon, Toasted House Made Bread
Millet, Chia, Almond Milk, Caramelized Bananas, Toasted Almond, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar

Apples, Labneh Cheese, Lemon Vinaigrette
Add Grilled Chicken, Scallops or Smoked Salmon

We reserve the right to charge an exceptional flat-rate cleaning fee of $180 if there is smoking in the room.
We would ask guests to respect the fact that all our rooms are no-smoking rooms.

Children up to age of 6 spend the night free in their parents’ room. We charge $50 per night for each additional bed for children up to age 12, and $150 per night for each additional bed for children from age 13.

We are glad to welcome your four-legged friend to our Eurath Hotel. The charge is $25 per night. Please, send us inquiry for pets other then dogs or cats. We also provide separate room for your pet when you're on trip or just, away from hotel.

Just drive by. Our valet parking service will take care of your car. On request we can provide covered garage spaces for $25 per night for garage $20 in our parking open parking space. We can also provide car cleaning services for $20

Suite is available for from 2 PM on the day you arrive. If you arrive earlier, you can use the thermal baths right away. Please vacate your room by 11:30 AM on the day you leave - you still have use of the thermal baths on this day.

Reservation canceling is free of charge up to 48 hours before arrival. In the event of cancellation at short notice, one night is charged if we are unable to fill the room with another booking. Applicable in the event of early departure.

"I would never believe anyone trying to describe or explain what an experience is to stay in this suite. Once I stayed with my wife in "Dreamy Selenia" suite, I'm returning every year, for 8 years now ... "
Browse through our beautiful  showcase of sights around town.
